select * from ( select row_number() over (order by access_id) as rn , access_id, access_name
, access_type from (select distinct access_id, access_name, access_type from access_rule ) as distinct_access
where
access_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and
access_type like concat('%',#{kind},'%')
) as sub where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select access_id, access_name , access_type , ar.allowd_id, allowd_name , ar.allowg_id, allowg_name from access_rule ar left join allow_departments ad on ar.allowd_id = ad.allowd_id left join allow_grade ag on ar.allowg_id = ag.allowg_id where access_id = #{accessId}
mapper.insert: insert into access_rule (access_id, access_name, allowd_id, allowg_id, access_type) values(#{accessId}, #{accessName}, #{allowdId}, #{allowgId}, #{accessType})
